text.author: Matthew Weaver
text.description: Silvio Berlusconi falls over himself - and his podium - to praise the US president
text.title: It's the Berlusconi and Bush show

main.p: They may not be everyone's favourite politicians, but they would make a great comedy double act.
Last night, the Italian prime minister, Silvio Berlusconi, fell over himself - and his podium - to praise George Bush.
"I'm 100% confident that we'll be friends forever," Berlusconi told the US president as he clutched the remains of the broken podium.
Steve Bell couldn't have scripted it better.
